abstract: Citigroup has formed a new unit within its investment bank that will bring together groups servicing private equity and infrastructure funds, according to an internal memorandum sent to employees on Tuesday.
snippet: Citigroup has formed a new unit within its investment bank that will bring together groups servicing private equity and infrastructure funds, according to an internal memorandum sent to employees on Tuesday.
